## PrimeStateInput type

Represents a version of `YootState` that guarantees the presence of `src`

**Signature:**

```typescript
type PrimeStateInput = {
  src: string;
} & Omit<YootState, 'src'>;
```

**References:** [YootState](./yoot.yootstate.md)

## Remarks

Used as input to adapter `primeState` methods.
